0_HUB_interacting.text: Press up to interact with interactable objects.

0_2_failed.text: Congratulations, you have failed the puzzle.

0_2_completed.text: Congratulations, you have completed the puzzle.

0_3_retry.text: In situations like this, use your retry button.

0_5_undo.text: Did you know? Undo system's checkpoints are created when you land on the ground after collecting, or using, an ability.

1_4S_special.text: Levels marked with S are completely optional.
They are usually very difficult, so don't feel bad for skipping them!
But this red fragment looks so tempting...
